markdownRemark.html:
Request for comment and review: property annexation

A lot near Belle Creek is requesting to be annexed by Commerce City. The city has asked for comments from anyone with a concern. Details are provided in this pdf.

To learn more, view this pdf notice of commerce city lot annexation.

frontmatter.title: October Belle Creek Metro District Meeting Minutes
